mapper.select: SELECT ma_name, SUM(ma_stockQuantity) AS totalQuantity, SUM(ma_stockValue) AS totalValue FROM material GROUP BY ma_name

SELECT DATE(ma_date) AS date, SUM(ma_stockValue) AS totalValue FROM material WHERE (ma_date BETWEEN '2024-09-08' AND '2024-09-13' OR ma_update BETWEEN '2024-09-08' AND '2024-09-13') GROUP BY DATE(ma_date) ORDER BY DATE(ma_date)
SELECT i.item_name, SUM(c.contracts_quantity) AS totalcon_quantity, SUM(c.contracts_price) AS totalcon_price FROM contracts c JOIN item i ON c.item_no = i.item_no GROUP BY c.item_no, i.item_name;
